original: Lundholm, Ragnar Olof, professor, Göteborg, f. 6/12/87 i Malmö av prof. Oscar L. o. Hanna Bolin. G. 22 m. Mary Beck. Barn: Gösta f. 23. — Fil. kand. i Sthlm 09, civ:ing:ex. (E) 11, tekn. dr i Sthlm 29. Ing. h. ASEA 13-14, vattenf :styr. kraftv:byrå 16, byråing. 20, förste byråing. 35, docent i elektromaskinlära v. KTH 29, prof. i elektr. anläggn :teknik v. CTH sed. 46. Stud:resor t. Tyskl., Höll, Ös-terr. o. Schw^eiz 25, 31 o. 33, tekn. expert f. Svirstroj, Leningrad, 34. Skr.: Nollpunktsjordning med Petersenspo-lar samt Uppvärmning av i jord förlagda kablar (22), A Generalized Vec-tor Theory for Electrical Alternating Current Circuits (24), Das Rechnen mit Vektoren in der Elektrotechnik (28), Överspänningar o. överspänningsskydd (44), avh. o. upps. i in- o. uti. tidskr. o. publ. RVO, LIVA.
translated: Lundholm, Ragnar Olof, professor, Gothenburg, b. 6/12/87 in Malmö to prof. Oscar L. and Hanna Bolin. Married on 22 with Mary Beck. Children: Gösta, b. 23. - B.A. in Stockholm 09, M.Sc. in engineering:ex. (E) 11, Ph.D. in Stockholm 29. Engineer at ASEA 13-14, water power control board 16, bureau engineer 20, senior bureau engineer 35, docent in electromechanical engineering at KTH 29, professor in electrical installation technology at CTH since 46. Study trips to Germany, Holland, Austria, and Switzerland in 25, 31, and 33, technical expert for Svirstroj, Leningrad, 34. Writings: Grounding with Petersen coils and Heating of cables buried in the ground (22), A Generalized Vector Theory for Electrical Alternating Current Circuits (24), Calculation with vectors in electrical engineering (28), Overvoltages and Overvoltage Protection (44), articles and publications in scientific journals and RVO, LIVA.
